# ctrlplane_deployment_system_link (Resource)

Links a deployment to a system in Ctrlplane. A deployment can be linked to multiple systems.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `deployment_id` (String) The ID of the deployment to link
- `system_id` (String) The ID of the system to link the deployment to

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Composite identifier in the format system_id/deployment_id
